{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year=2000 |Team=Wyoming Cowboys |Image= |ImageSize = |Conference=Western Athletic Conference |Division= |ShortConference=WAC |Record= 1-10 |ConfRecord= |CoachRank= |APRank= |HeadCoach=[[Vic Koenning]] |OffCoach= |DefCoach= |OScheme= |DScheme= |Stadium=[[War Memorial Stadium (Wyoming)|War Memorial Stadium]] |Champion= |BowlTourney= |BowlTourneyResult= }} {{2000 Mountain West Conference football standings}} The '''2000 Wyoming Cowboys football team''' represented the [[University of Wyoming]] in the [[2000 NCAA Division I-A football season]]. The Cowboys offense scored 170 points, while the defense allowed 393 points.
